full_text.full_text:
Outliers
▪ Data objects that have characteristics that are different from 
most of the other data objects in the data set
▪ Or, values that are unusual with respect to the typical values
▪ Also referred to as anomalous objects or values
▪ Many different definitions have been proposed by the 
statisticians and data mining communities
▪ It is important to distinguish between noise and outliers
– Outliers can be legitimate data objects or values
22
